title: #118 Robin Sharma on How Following Your Dreams Unlocks Your Inner Genius
description: This week’s guest on Impact Theory with Tom Bilyeu is Robin Sharma. Robin Sharma is considered to be one of the top 5 leadership experts in the world. He has worked with rock stars, royalty, billionaires and many celebrity CEOs. His books, The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari, The 5am Club, and The Leader Who Had No Title have topped numerous international bestseller lists. In this episode, he talks about why you should wake up early and how to get clarity around your life's mission.
